description: Figura lets you load custom avatars to use. The Figura menu can be found in the pause menu.
Notable things you may want to consider for compatability between Figura and this modpack:
• Some modded armour causes crashes with custom armour pivots. Recomended you either hide armour or dont use custom armour pivots.
• You can see your full model in first person, so things that might get in the way of seeing should be hidden on the host side in first person.
